section.name: Generating a project skeleton
section.p: The javanet:genapp goal generates a skeleton for a java.net project. It sets up mailing lists, source repository information, issue tracking URL, and a few other things according to the java.net project layout. It also set properties up so that you can use other maven java.net plugin goals.
This goal doesn't perform the javanet:register-repository goal, so you need to run it separately, when you are ready to deploy your artifacts.
